titles.title: Amusement Park Ride Child Labor Act of 2004

To require the Secretary of Labor to declare that operating power driven amusement park rides is a hazardous occupation for the purposes of certain child labor provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
Amusement Park Ride Child Labor Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of Labor to find and declare by order that operating power-driven amusement park rides is a hazardous occupation for the purposes of certain child labor provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
